name: HybridRacer
description:
Hi everyone !

This my first game ever made, not that compex but working so that's the most important :)

To fit this gamejam theme I decided to create a racing game where your car is an hybrid car.  Plus, your task is not only to drive and avoid other cars. You also need to be carefull about your gasoline and electricity.

Run out of one of the two and this is a game over !

I hope you will enjoy the game and, of course, any comment is welcome :)

 

Github repository :

https://github.com/antchaux/HybridRacer
